Sentencas: This work investigates the catalytic properties of Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2x (Ir/CGO) catalyst and CGO support in steam reforming of methane in the absence or presence of H2S (50?ppm) for further application in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) working under methane at intermediate temperatures and integrating a gradual internal reforming concept.
Titulo: Catalytic Steam Methane Reforming Over Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x: Resistance to Coke Formation and Sulfur Poisoning

Sentencas: The catalytic activity was measured at 750 degrees C by using a 50?mol.% CH4/5?mol.% H2O/45?mol.% N2 mixture and a 10?mol.% CH4/90?mol.% N2 mixture.
Titulo: Catalytic Steam Methane Reforming Over Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x: Resistance to Coke Formation and Sulfur Poisoning

Sentencas: The addition of Ir to CGO improves the catalytic activity in hydrogen production by two orders of magnitude with respect to that of CGO alone.
Titulo: Catalytic Steam Methane Reforming Over Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x: Resistance to Coke Formation and Sulfur Poisoning

Sentencas: Temperature programmed oxidation experiments were performed after reaction in both types of mixtures to study the eventual formation of carbon deposits.
Titulo: Catalytic Steam Methane Reforming Over Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x: Resistance to Coke Formation and Sulfur Poisoning

Sentencas: Over Ir/CGO, carbon formed in little amounts (even in the absence of H2O in the feed), being highly reactive toward O2.
Titulo: Catalytic Steam Methane Reforming Over Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x: Resistance to Coke Formation and Sulfur Poisoning

Sentencas: Upon H2S addition, the CGO support exhibited surprisingly an improved catalytic activity on the contrary to Ir/CGO which partly deactivated.
Titulo: Catalytic Steam Methane Reforming Over Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x: Resistance to Coke Formation and Sulfur Poisoning

Sentencas: Upon suppression of H2S in the feed the initial catalytic activity was fully restored for both catalysts.
Titulo: Catalytic Steam Methane Reforming Over Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x: Resistance to Coke Formation and Sulfur Poisoning

Sentencas: The catalytic behavior of CGO in the presence of H2S was discussed, based upon temperature programmed reaction of CH4.
Titulo: Catalytic Steam Methane Reforming Over Ir/Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x: Resistance to Coke Formation and Sulfur Poisoning
